cause.description:
A cause based on "The Loyal Order of the P.U.P (Practitioners of Underground Philanthropy), a group started by Bill "The Bionic Turkey" Gordon and his students from Bev Facey High School in Sherwood Park, Alberta, Canada.
By agreeing to the positions/commitments below, any member of this cause is henceforth entitled to be known as a P.U.P.P.I (A Practitioner of Underground Philanthropy and Positive Interactions)
phi·lan·thro·py (fĭ-lān'thrə-pē) n. pl. phi·lan·thro·pies
1. The effort or inclination to increase the well-being of humankind, as by charitable aid or donations. 2. Love of humankind in general. 3. Something, such as an activity or institution, intended to promote human welfare.
The Description and Positions of this cause are based on "The Loyal Order of the P.U.P" which was developed by "Bill "The Bionic Turkey" Gordon; a.k.a. Grand Old PUPPI
Join The PUPPI Group!: http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=2483980137
1. Treat myself and others with respect.
2. Give myself a "gift" (friendship, laughter, time, love, family, etc.) each day.
3. Engage in an act of kindness each week.
4. Engage in an act of beauty each month.
5. Take the time to tell the important people in my life how much I appreciate them.
cause.mission: To spread love, compassion, and beauty through random acts of kindness.
cause.name: Random Acts of Kindness
